title: Grateful Dead Live at Patrick Gymnasium, University of Vermont on 1983-04-13
lineage: MAC > Sony TC-D5M (no Dolby) > Realtek AC97 > Soundforge > CD-Wave > TLH v.1.0.0.72 > FLAC.
source: Nakamichi CM-300's (no shotguns) > patched thru one Sony D5 > Marantz PMD-340 > TDK SA-90's. Mics on stand aprx six feet high, set up second or third row up in the bleachers directly behind the soundboard.
